text:
Hi. I'm probably not the first person to join the slack and ask this, but from a search I can't find any previous examples. I'm doing my CMS for Developers Practicum and i'm stuck on this section....

_Drag and drop area_
• _Must have two columns with an image module and a rich text module._
• _These modules must have default content set inside the template_
... it appears to want me to set-up a basic two column layout in my template, so that I can set the default content, but it's also showing the accompanying gif use of the content editor to change the column widths dynamically, which as far as I was aware wasn't something that could be done if I've setup the layout in the template already. Am I missing something?

Thanks in advance.
Hey Daniel, once you setup the template with the correct DND code, you’ll be able to adjust column widths in the editor. What’s the part you’re having issues with?
Hi <@U03A2BZ3REG>, when you set up CSS, you can use the layout.css from the CMS boilerplate. That will set up columns to shrink/grow like they do in the gif you're talking about
